reasoning: Groups only files with direct, obvious relationships
Package managers: package.json nests its lock files and workspace config
Environment files: .env nests its example template
Git config: .gitignore nests related git artifacts
Documentation: Main README nests implementation and migration docs
Entry points: cli.js nests the secondary index.js entry point
Does NOT nest folders under files
Does NOT nest loosely related files
Follows VS Code's recommended conservative patterns
